mapper.update: update board_comment set comment_content = #{comment_content} where comment_no = #{comment_no}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(comment_nickName), 0) from board_comment where comment_bno = #{comment_bno}
select c.*, to_char(comment_writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') comment_writedate from board_comment c where comment_bno = #{comment_bno} order by comment_no
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment(comment_bno, comment_writer, comment_content, comment_category, comment_nickname) values (#{comment_bno}, #{comment_writer}, #{comment_content}, #{comment_category}, #{comment_nickname})
